name: La Quinta Inn & Suites Orange County - Santa Ana

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent one night here prior to our pre-booked Disney package at a Sheraton property. Our only regret is that we should have stayed at La Quinta instead! The front desk was extremely friendly and prompt and the room was superb. The value is incredible and included a microwave and fridge along with their standard breakfast. Outstanding pool and spa facility and the grounds were immaculate. The front desk offers Disney tickets at a considerably reduced rate from the front gate, which was a plus for our son and his family who met us there. On our next visit to Disney we will definitely make this our home base. It is too far for a shuttle, but for the oustanding accomodations and great value, it is worth driving the 9 miles and parking in the Disney lot. Another winner La Quinta! Keep up the outstanding job!
reviews.title: Outstanding Stay----beats the Sheraton hands down!

reviews.text: We stayed here during a short trip with our kids. We left for the day, and returned to find our keys didn't work, went to To the front desk, and learned When our room was booked they only booked us for one night instead of the two we requested, they charged us over $30 more for the second night, and suggested we take it up with the manager the next day. Spoke with the mgr the next morning and was told that we didn't have proof that we scheduled 2 nights with them and there was nothing they could do. This after, not checking out after the first day and leaving all of our stuff in the room? Wouldn't that be proof we were to be there the second night? We will never stay at a Laquinta again, and my husband is cab driver that will never recommend them again.
reviews.title: DON'T BOOK HERE.....

reviews.text: I reviewed this hotel a few months ago while staying for business. I previously gave the hotel 4 circles, this time it only gets 2.
reviews.title: You can do better for the same price, close by

reviews.text: I picked the La Quinta to see if there was a difference of service since I had a poor experience from the last LQ Stay. I have to say, it was very wonderful. The location is convenient as it's next to the Costa Mesa Freeway and John Wayne Airport. The property was in excellent shape, and the rooms were magnificent. Even with the freeway and airport nearby, I slept wonderfully in the bed and experienced no problems. Check in and Check out were prompt and efficient. I would stay here when I visit Santa Ana
reviews.title: Wonderful Stay

reviews.text: We stayed here for a quick weekend trip to visit family. We LOVE the La Quinta we stay at in St. George so we thought we would give this location a try. Biulding is obviously older but overall we were very satisfied with our stay and have already booked a second stay. Here is a breakdown of the pros and cons.
reviews.title: Noisy Nights but Satisfactory

reviews.text: Pros: Great location off the freeway
reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised

reviews.text: My wife and I stayed 12 - 15 May '12 for a family visit in Santa Ana. The king ste is very large and well equiped. Mini fridge/micro and bar is included. Nice flat screen TV. King bed very
reviews.title: great place near john wayne airport

reviews.text: comfortable. The included breakfast was very good but standard fare. The lady making waffles was very nice. All front desk employees were very nice and helpfull. The only negative I have for this review is the couch and chair in the room could use a update, not to comfortable.
reviews.title: bliss

reviews.text: I would definitly stay here again.
reviews.title: Fun stay

reviews.text: calm.comforting.freindly staff, excellent service all around many places to eat and things to do.or just stay in and enjoy there amazing t.v. or the soothing bath
reviews.title: Definitely a tremendous bargain

reviews.text: Spent a restful night here for about $100. Giant room, well appointed. Staff is friendly and you get a real breakfast to boot. Great value for the area.
reviews.title: Nice spot, big room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed here in February 2012 for a pre-cruise stay and had a king suite. Price was pretty good too. It had a separate living area separated from the bedroom by a little wall. Free in-room internet, flat screen tv, comfortable bed and good shower/bathroom. It also came with breakfast including the basics of cereal, pastries, coffee & juice etc but it also had someone cooking waffles for you and it also had hot premade scrambled eggs, sausage & bacon. Not the best tasting hot food but the waffles were actually very good.
reviews.title: Good hotel for the price!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I liked it so much I'm staying there again in 2 weeks for another pre-cruise stay. It is about a 30 minute drive to the cruise terminals.
reviews.title: Customer Service and Nice Breakfast

reviews.text: Convenient location right off the freeway and by the John Wayne airport. A mall & lots of restaurants a short distance away. We ate at Chili's which was about a 5 minute drive from the hotel.
reviews.title: The details at La Quinta

aka: La Quinta Inn Santa Ana Hotel
